Molecular Hamiltonian (fd_greens.molecular_hamiltonian)

class MolecularHamiltonian(qubits: Sequence[cirq.ops.raw_types.Qid], molecule: openfermion.chem.molecular_data.MolecularData, occupied_indices: Optional[Sequence[int]] = None, active_indices: Optional[Sequence[int]] = None)[source]

Bases: fd_greens.cirq_ver.operators.OperatorsBase

Molecular Hamiltonian.

Initializes a MolecularHamiltonian object.

Example:

molecule = MolecularData(
    [["Li", (0, 0, 0)], ["H", (0, 0, bond_distance)]],
    'sto3g',
    multiplicity=1,
    charge=0)
run_pyscf(molecule)

hamiltonian = MolecularHamiltonian(
    cirq.LineQubit.range(4),
    molecule,
    occupied_indices=[0],
    active_indices=[1, 2])
Parameters

  • qubits – Qubits on which the qubit operator acts.

  • molecule – The molecule from which Hamiltonian is constructed.

  • occupied_indices – A list of occupied orbital indices.

  • active_indices – A list of active orbital indices.

transform(method_indices_pairs: Iterable[Tuple[str, Sequence[int]]], tapered_state: Optional[Sequence[int]] = None) → None[source]

Transforms the Hamiltonian terms with Z2 symmetries and qubit tapering.

copy() → fd_greens.cirq_ver.molecular_hamiltonian.MolecularHamiltonian[source]

Returns a copy of itself.

property matrix: numpy.ndarray

Returns the matrix form of the Hamiltonian.

get_h2_hamiltonian(bond_distance: float) → fd_greens.cirq_ver.molecular_hamiltonian.MolecularHamiltonian[source]

Returns the HOMO-LUMO LiH Hamiltonian with bond length r.

Parameters

bond_distance – The bond length of the molecule in Angstrom.

Returns

hamiltonian – The molecular Hamiltonian of LiH.

bond_distance – The bond length of the molecule in Angstrom.

Returns

Returns the HOMO-LUMO NaH Hamiltonian with bond length r.

Parameters

bond_distance – The bond length of the molecule in Angstrom.

Returns

get_alkali_hydride_hamiltonian(metal_atom: str, bond_length: float) → fd_greens.cirq_ver.molecular_hamiltonian.MolecularHamiltonian[source]

Returns an alkali hydride Hamiltonian.

Parameters

  • metal_atom – The alkali metal atom.

  • bond_length – Bond length of the alkali metal hydride molecule.

Returns

hamiltonian – The metal hydride Hamiltonian.
